Package com.cameronseid.garden

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cameronseid.garden.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plant

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic tile object. Any blank tiles will be this object
